DOC.brief_summary: Recently , preventive effect Helicobacter pylorus ( Hp ) eradication treatment incidence gastric cancer report . By Hp eradication treatment perform Hp-infected people Iijima town , evaluate whether incidence gastric cancer and/or medical care cost reduce compare previous year .
